## printing 1 to 10

the codes below will print the numbers **1 to 10**

```{r integers}
print (1)
print (2)
print (3)
print (4)
print (5)
print (6)
print (7)
print (8)
print (9)
print (10)
```

## using for loop

the codes below uses for loop

```{r for loop}
for (i in 1:10){
  print (i)
}
```
